name: loouislow
description: My portfolio website built with Krugurt.js and Yogurt.css frameworks

scripts.build-dev: npm run get-frameworks && npm run build-image && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-style && npm run build-html && npm run build-data && npm run build-locale && npm run build-sw && npm run build-manifest && npm run gulp pdf-resume
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-image && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-style && npm run build-html && npm run build-data && npm run build-locale && npm run build-sw && npm run build-manifest && npm run gulp remove-js && npm run gulp remove-css && npm run gulp pdf-resume
scripts.build-style: npm run gulp sass && npm run gulp css && npm run gulp purge-css
scripts.build-scripts: npm run gulp pre-scripts && npm run gulp scripts
scripts.build-image: npm run gulp image-high-quality && npm run gulp image-low-quality

author: Loouis Low <loouis@gmail.com>
